Hey, Destin, Would you mind doing a video on bee flight? It seems everywhere I go, people say that bees should not be able to fly, yet they can. It seems like something that would be interesting to see in slow-motion as it is (the bee), seemingly defying physics. Of course, that's only my opinion. Thanks for your time.

Looking at this footage, and just observing bird, it appears that the birds are flying in a oddly straight line. I would expect from flapping their wings they would go up on the down stroke and then fall down slightly until the stroke down again. Are they actually going up and down, like waves or are they travelling in a straight line?
